lyrics:
13 contributorsthirsty lyricsverse 1
you got that lemonade but baby i aint buying
need something hotter to melt the ice
get you some gatorade because your mouth is drying
from drooling over me day and night

prechorus
cant you hold your horses
i know you want the cake but dont skip all the courses

chorus
boy youre too thirstyayayayay for me eheh
wont get to first baaaaase by begging me
da da da da da da
you wanna play the game
give me a little space and maybe youll get a taste
boy youre too thirstyayayayay for me eheh
da da da da da da

t to the h to the irsty you thirsty
you thirsty da da da da da da

verse 2
you want that bottle pop you want that cocacola
but im not ready to open up
you want my walls to drop wanna invite me over
then imma need you to slow that talk
